source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 809,917 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 306,367.
Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

spells.description: Equip: Your gear warms with Woven Dawnthread and gains 756 Critical Strike when over 80% health.

Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,546 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 198 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

Use: Bind a spectral essence to an enemy for 20 sec, causing allied attacks to heal for 30% of damage dealt, up to 2.5 million total healing.

When the essence expires or is removed early, the remaining healing bursts, healing up to 5 allies within 8 yds. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)
Equip: Your gear warms with Woven Dawnthread and gains 756 Critical Strike when over 80% health.

name: Alliance Tabard
description: A fine tabard that provides no useful combat effects, but it will let everyone know you represent the Alliance.
